TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DataSpace extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the default names for the models in the [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](../../add/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about the models in the [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](../../add/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)], see [Metadata Workspace Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/b9c75c95-7626-484d-86bb-2ddd4c7042e2).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Metadata.Edm.DataSpace CSpace = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Represents the default name for the conceptual model.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Metadata.Edm.DataSpace CSSpace = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Represents the default name for the mapping between the conceptual model and the storage model.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Metadata.Edm.DataSpace OCSpace = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Represents the default name for the mapping between the object model and the conceptual model.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Metadata.Edm.DataSpace OSpace = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Represents the default name for the object model.

Docs.summary: Represents the default name for the storage model.
